titleStmt.title: [William Kethe his seeing glasse] [sent to the nobles and gentlemen of England, whereunto is added the praier of Daniell in meeter.]
titleStmt.author: Kethe, William, d. 1608?

notesStmt.note: Aiiii, caption title reads: Unto the ryghte honourable the nobilitie and ientlemen of Englande: Willyam Kethe wisheth peace, with constancye of mynde.
Running title reads: To the noble [et] ientlemen of Englande.
Signatures: A (-A1-3 and A8) B C¹+.
Imperfect: A1-3, including title page, A8 and all after C1 lacking; some pages stained. The portion lacking includes: "The praier of Daniell in meeter".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
